definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Once the Iso image has been created it can be burned to DVD.
sentences.chinese: 一旦ISO鏡像創建好，它就可以燒錄成DVD了。

sentences.english: 'months' returns an mirrored array with the month-numbers of the year.
sentences.chinese: 返回一年裏月份數的鏡像數組。

sentences.english: The figure on the right side is a mirror-image of the left side and is used for disaster recovery purposes.
sentences.chinese: 右側圖片是左側圖片的鏡像，用於災難恢復。

sentences.english: Break disk mirrors into active and offline sides.
sentences.chinese: 將磁盤鏡像分爲活動方和脫機方。

sentences.english: “We can use mirror cells as a honeypot, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: “我們可以利用鏡像細胞作爲誘餌，”他說。

sentences.english: Open Disk Utility. Create a new image with these options.
sentences.chinese: 打開磁盤工具，創建一個新鏡像，參數如下。

sentences.english: When you're done, you can create two disjointed sets of virtual images.
sentences.chinese: 在您完成之後，您就可以創建兩個不相關的虛擬鏡像。

sentences.english: The mirroring process can take some time.
sentences.chinese: 這個鏡像過程需要一些時間。

sentences.english: It’s his job to build the genome and protein infrastructure for mirror life.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作是爲鏡像生命構築基因組和蛋白基本結構。

sentences.english: Mirror-image DNA is one of the greatest discoveries in the history of molecular biology.
sentences.chinese: 鏡像DNA的存在是分子生物學史上一個重要發現。

sentences.english: Select the image from your private catalog.
sentences.chinese: 從您的私有目錄中選擇鏡像。

sentences.english: Such a group of formation is briefly referred to as a transformation group.
sentences.chinese: 錯切變換是產生物體鏡像的一種變換。

sentences.english: The installer failed to download a file from the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 安裝程式無法由鏡像站下載某些檔案。

sentences.english: “But that’s the beauty of mirror life, ” Church says.
sentences.chinese: “但這也是鏡像生命的美妙之處，”丘奇說。

sentences.english: The installer failed to access the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 安裝程式無法存取該鏡像站。

sentences.english: Mount the split mirror copy of all tablespace containers.
sentences.chinese: 裝配所有表空間容器的分割鏡像拷貝。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
